title: "RoboNotify Wallpapers"
content: RoboNotify Wallpapers is a website that provides a collection of high-quality wallpapers featuring a simple graphic of a robot arm holding a smartphone. These wallpapers are designed to help you stay organized by providing a space for placing important notifications or messages. With RoboNotify Wallpapers, you can choose from a variety of different designs and color schemes to find the perfect wallpaper for your device. Whether you're looking for a minimalist design or something more eye-catching, we have a wallpaper that will suit your style. Download our wallpapers today and stay on top of your notifications in style!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper featuring a simple graphic of a robot arm holding a smartphone, with a space for placing important notifications or messages."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
